graph_effects.description: Creates a new node in the graph.

parameters.name: nodeType
parameters.description: The type of node to create (e.g., User, Group, Resource).

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A set of properties to initialize the node with (e.g., name, ID).

graph_effects.description: Updates an existing node in the graph.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the node to update.

parameters.name: updates
parameters.description: The properties to update on the node (e.g., name, status).

graph_effects.description: Deletes a node from the graph.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the node to be deleted.

graph_effects.description: Creates a new edge between two nodes in the graph.

parameters.name: sourceNodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the source node for the edge.

parameters.name: targetNodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the target node for the edge.

parameters.name: relationshipType
parameters.description: The type of relationship the edge represents (e.g., manages, belongs_to).

graph_effects.description: Updates properties of an existing edge between two nodes.

parameters.name: edgeId
parameters.description: The ID of the edge to update.

parameters.name: updates
parameters.description: The properties to update on the edge (e.g., weight, labels).

graph_effects.description: Deletes an edge between two nodes in the graph.

parameters.name: edgeId
parameters.description: The ID of the edge to be deleted.
